param.name: level[x]textfont
param.label: Caption Font
param.description: Determines the font style of the button caption

param.name: level[x]linktitle
param.label: Caption
param.description: Determines the text will appear on the button as caption

param.name: level[x]linkurl
param.label: Url
param.description: Determines the location where the button will point to

param.name: level[x]color
param.label: Color
param.description: Determines the color of the button
